The fog could create a light coating of ice on roads and sidewalks where temperatures are below freezing. Please use caution if traveling this morning.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 4:31AM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...DENSE FOG COULD CREATE HAZARDOUS TRAVEL CONDITIONS AT TIMES OVERNIGHT... Moisture flowing across the mostly frozen bay is producing areas of dense fog across Door and Kewaunee counties this morning. Visibilities may be below a quarter mile at times, so please travel with care until the fog dissipates.
